block.comment: Three liveshare configs: liveshare.guestApprovalRequired, liveshare.anonymousGuestApproval, and liveshare.shareExternalFiles, have been added to your VS Code config by the Block CPE team. They are a mandatory security requirement which must be met (CPENG-706). Please leave them as-is.
previousSettings.comment: Your config was invalid JSON and prevented us from ensuring required security controls were in place. You can find your original config at `/Users/davidzhang/Library/Application Support/Code/User/settings.json.bak` if you would like to try to recover them.
